Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.common.DiskCacheUtility
    Provided only to help with the transition of pre-v3.4 disk caches to the current version. This class will be removed in a future release.
    com.here.android.mpa.search.GeocodeRequest
    As of release 3.6. Use GeocodeRequest2 instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.MapActivity
    As of SDK 3.3, replaced by MapFragment.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapGesture.addOnGestureListener(MapGesture.OnGestureListener)
    As of SDK 3.3, use MapGesture.addOnGestureListener(MapGesture.OnGestureListener, int, boolean) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2.CLE2DataManager.cancelAllLayerDowloads()
    Deprecated as of release 3.4. Keep track of your download tasks and use CLE2Task.cancel() instead
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2.CLE2DataManager.cancelDownload(String)
    Deprecated as of release 3.4. Use CLE2Task.cancel() on a download task obtained from CLE2DataManager.newDownloadLayerTask(String)
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2.CLE2DataManager.deleteAll()
    Deprecated as of release 3.4. Use CLE2DataManager.newPurgeLocalStorageTask()
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2.CLE2DataManager.deleteLayer(String)
    Deprecated as release of 3.4. Use CLE2DataManager.newDeleteLayersTask(List, CLE2DataManager.StorageType) with CLE2DataManager.StorageType.LOCAL instead
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route.deserialize(byte[])
    Deprecated as of release 3.4. Use Route.deserializeAsync(byte[], Route.DeserializationCallback) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2.CLE2DataManager.downloadLayer(String, CLE2DataManager.CLE2DownloadListener)
    Deprecated as of release 3.4. Use CLE2DataManager.newDownloadLayerTask(String) instead
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RoadView.getAnimationEnabled()
    As of SDK 3.5. This feature is no longer supported.
    com.here.android.mpa.search.Location.getId()
    As of SDK 3.3, this method is deprecated and always returns null.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapMarker.getInfoBubbleHashCode()
    Deprecated as of version 3.6. Always returns 0. Use MapOverlay instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.Map.getPositionIndicator()
    As of SDK 3.3. Use MapFragment.getPositionIndicator() or MapView.getPositionIndicator() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.search.TextSuggestionRequest.getRichTextFormatting()
    As of SDK 3.6. Use TextAutoSuggestionRequest instead. TextSuggestionRequest does not support text formatting. The method getRichTextFormatting is deprecated. If you want to receive HTML formatted response use TextAutoSuggestionRequest instead in online mode.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapFragment.init(Context, MapEngine.MapVariant, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use MapEngine.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.MapEngine.init(Context, MapEngine.MapVariant, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use MapEngine.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.streetlevel.StreetLevelFragment.init(Context, MapEngine.MapVariant, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use MapEngine.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.ar.CompositeFragment.init(Context, MapEngine.MapVariant, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use CompositeFragment.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.VenueMapFragment.init(Context, MapEngine.MapVariant, OnEngineInitListener, VenueService.VenueServiceListener)
    As of SDK 3.5. Use VenueMapFragment#init(ApplicationContext, MapVariant, OnEngineInitListener, VenueServiceListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapFragment.init(Context, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use MapEngine.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.VenueMapFragment.init(Context, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.5. Use VenueMapFragment.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.MapEngine.init(Context, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use MapEngine.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.streetlevel.StreetLevelFragment.init(Context, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use MapEngine.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.ar.CompositeFragment.init(Context, OnEngineInitListener)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use CompositeFragment.init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.VenueMapFragment.init(Context, OnEngineInitListener, VenueService.VenueServiceListener)
    As of SDK 3.5. Use VenueMapFragment#init(ApplicationContext, OnEngineInitListener, VenueServiceListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapMarker.isInfoBubbleVisible()
    Deprecated as of version 3.6. Always returns false. Use MapOverlay instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.VenueService.VenueServiceListener.onGetVenueCompleted(Venue)
    As of SDK 3.3. Use VenueService.VenueLoadListener instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapFragment.onInflate(Activity, AttributeSet, Bundle)
    Deprecated as of release 3.5. Use #onInflate(Context, android.util.AttributeSet, android.os.Bundle) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.ar.CompositeFragment.onInflate(Activity, AttributeSet, Bundle)
    Deprecated as of release 3.5. Use onInflate(Context, android.util.AttributeSet, android.os.Bundle) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RerouteListener.onRerouteEnd(Route)
    As of SDK 3.4. Instead use NavigationManager.RerouteListener.onRerouteEnd(RouteResult).
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener.onTrafficRerouted(Route)
    As of SDK 3.4. Instead use NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener.onTrafficRerouted(RouteResult).
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route.serialize(Route)
    Deprecated as of release 3.4. Use Route.serializeAsync(Route, Route.SerializationCallback) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RoadView.setAnimationEnabled(boolean)
    As of SDK 3.5. This feature is no longer supported.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.Map.setCustomMapConfiguration(String, String)
    As of SDK 3.4. Use CustomConfigurations.set(Hashtable) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteOptions.setFetchElevationData(boolean)
    As of SDK 3.3, this feature will no longer be supported. Elevation data will be requested for all routes automatically in online/offline modes. The data will be returned in the Route geometry, when available.
    com.here.android.mpa.search.TextSuggestionRequest.setRichTextFormatting(RichTextFormatting)
    As of SDK 3.6. Use TextAutoSuggestionRequest instead. TextSuggestionRequest does not support text formatting. The method setRichTextFormatting is deprecated. If you want to receive HTML formatted response use TextAutoSuggestionRequest instead in online mode.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener.TrafficEnabledRoutingState.ONGOING_REQUEST
    As of SDK 3.4. Will not occur.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RoutingError.REQUEST_TIMEOUT
    As of SDK 3.3. Use RoutingError.NETWORK_COMMUNICATION.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.RoadElement.FormOfWay.SERVICE_ACCESS_OTHER
    As of Release 3.4. No longer supported. No roads will have this form of way value.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.RoadElement.FormOfWay.SERVICE_ACCESS_PARKING
    As of Release 3.4. No longer supported. No roads will have this form of way value.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.RoadElement.FormOfWay.SERVICE_ROAD
    As of Release 3.4. No longer supported. It is now replaced with RoadElement.FormOfWay.SERVICE_ACCESS
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteOptions.TransportMode.TRACK
    As of SDK 3.3 TRACK mode is no longer supported and a route will not be calculated if using this mode. Please see CoreRouter.calculateRoute for more information.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapRoute.RenderType.TRAVELED
    As of SDK 3.6. Use MapRoute.setTraveledColor(int).
